name: Microsoft Security Baseline for Windows Server 2022
description: Microsoft recommended security configuration baseline settings for Windows Server 2022

PasswordHistorySize.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy
PasswordHistorySize.recommendation: Set 'Enforce password history' to '24 or more password(s)'
PasswordHistorySize.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Password Policy > 'Enforce password history' to '24' or more passwords.

MaximumPasswordAge.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy
MaximumPasswordAge.recommendation: Set 'Maximum password age' to '60 or fewer days, but not 0'
MaximumPasswordAge.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Password Policy > 'Maximum Password Age' to '60' or fewer days.

MinimumPasswordAge.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy
MinimumPasswordAge.recommendation: Set 'Minimum password age' to '1 or more day(s)'
MinimumPasswordAge.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Password Policy > 'Minimum Password Age' to '1' or more day(s).

MinimumPasswordLength.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy
MinimumPasswordLength.recommendation: Set 'Minimum password length' to '14 or more character(s)'
MinimumPasswordLength.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Password Policy > 'Minimum Password Length' to '14' or more characters.

PasswordComplexity.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy
PasswordComplexity.recommendation: Ensure 'Password must meet complexity requirements' is set to 'Enabled'
PasswordComplexity.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Password Policy > 'Password must meet complexity requirements' to 'Enabled'.

ClearTextPassword.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy
ClearTextPassword.recommendation: Ensure 'Store passwords using reversible encryption' is set to 'Disabled'
ClearTextPassword.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Password Policy > 'Store passwords using reversible encryption' to 'Disabled'.

AccountLockoutDuration.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Account Lockout Policy
AccountLockoutDuration.recommendation: Set 'Account lockout duration' to '15 or more minute(s)'
AccountLockoutDuration.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Account Lockout Policy > 'Account lockout duration' to '15' or more minutes.

AccountLockoutThreshold.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Account Lockout Policy
AccountLockoutThreshold.recommendation: Set 'Account lockout threshold' to '5 or fewer invalid logon attempt(s), but not 0'
AccountLockoutThreshold.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Account Lockout Policy > 'Account lockout threshold' to '5' or fewer invalid login attempts.

ResetAccountLockoutCounter.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Account Lockout Policy
ResetAccountLockoutCounter.recommendation: Set 'Reset account lockout counter after' to '15 or more minute(s)'
ResetAccountLockoutCounter.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Account Policies > Account Lockout Policy > 'Reset account lockout counter after' to '15' or more minutes.

AuditAccountLogon.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Advanced Audit Policy Configuration\Audit Policies\Account Logon
AuditAccountLogon.recommendation: Configure 'Audit Account Logon Events' to 'Success and Failure'
AuditAccountLogon.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Advanced Audit Policy Configuration > Audit Policies > Account Logon > 'Audit Credential Validation' to 'Success and Failure'.

AuditAccountManagement.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Advanced Audit Policy Configuration\Audit Policies\Account Management
AuditAccountManagement.recommendation: Configure 'Audit Account Management' to 'Success and Failure'
AuditAccountManagement.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Advanced Audit Policy Configuration > Audit Policies > Account Management > 'Audit User Account Management' to 'Success and Failure'.

AuditLogon.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Advanced Audit Policy Configuration\Audit Policies\Logon/Logoff
AuditLogon.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Advanced Audit Policy Configuration > Audit Policies > Logon/Logoff > 'Audit Logon' to 'Success and Failure'.

AuditPolicyChange.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Advanced Audit Policy Configuration\Audit Policies\Policy Change
AuditPolicyChange.recommendation: Configure 'Audit Policy Change' to 'Success and Failure'
AuditPolicyChange.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Advanced Audit Policy Configuration > Audit Policies > Policy Change > 'Audit Audit Policy Change' to 'Success and Failure'.

AuditPrivilegeUse.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Advanced Audit Policy Configuration\Audit Policies\Privilege Use
AuditPrivilegeUse.recommendation: Configure 'Audit Privilege Use' to 'Success and Failure'
AuditPrivilegeUse.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Advanced Audit Policy Configuration > Audit Policies > Privilege Use > 'Audit Sensitive Privilege Use' to 'Success and Failure'.

AuditSystemEvents.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Advanced Audit Policy Configuration\Audit Policies\System
AuditSystemEvents.recommendation: Configure 'Audit System Events' to 'Success and Failure'
AuditSystemEvents.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Advanced Audit Policy Configuration > Audit Policies > System > 'Audit Security System Extension' to 'Success and Failure'.

EnableFirewall.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
EnableFirewall.description: Windows Firewall: Protect all network connections
EnableFirewall.recommendation: Ensure 'Windows Firewall: Domain: Firewall state' is set to 'On'
EnableFirewall.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Windows Firewall with Advanced Security > Windows Firewall Properties > Domain Profile > Firewall state to 'On'.

DisableGuestAccount.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Local Policies\Security Options
DisableGuestAccount.recommendation: Ensure 'Accounts: Guest account status' is set to 'Disabled'
DisableGuestAccount.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Local Policies > Security Options > 'Accounts: Guest account status' to 'Disabled'.

LimitBlankPasswordUse.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Local Policies\Security Options
LimitBlankPasswordUse.description: Accounts: Limit local account use of blank passwords to console logon only
LimitBlankPasswordUse.recommendation: Ensure 'Accounts: Limit local account use of blank passwords to console logon only' is set to 'Enabled'
LimitBlankPasswordUse.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Local Policies > Security Options > 'Accounts: Limit local account use of blank passwords to console logon only' to 'Enabled'.

NoLMHash.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Local Policies\Security Options
NoLMHash.description: Network security: Do not store LAN Manager hash value on next password change
NoLMHash.recommendation: Ensure 'Network security: Do not store LAN Manager hash value on next password change' is set to 'Enabled'
NoLMHash.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Local Policies > Security Options > 'Network security: Do not store LAN Manager hash value on next password change' to 'Enabled'.

LsaProtection.path: Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Local Policies\Security Options
LsaProtection.recommendation: Ensure 'Run all administrators in Admin Approval Mode' is set to 'Enabled'
LsaProtection.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Windows Settings > Security Settings > Local Policies > Security Options > 'User Account Control: Run all administrators in Admin Approval Mode' to 'Enabled'.

SMBv1.recommendation: Ensure 'Configure SMB v1 server' is set to 'Disabled'
SMBv1.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > MS Security Guide > 'Configure SMB v1 server' to 'Disabled'.

PowerShellTranscription.recommendation: Ensure 'Turn on PowerShell Transcription' is set to 'Enabled'
PowerShellTranscription.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > Windows Components > Windows PowerShell > 'Turn on PowerShell Transcription' to 'Enabled'.

CredentialGuard.recommendation: Ensure 'Turn On Virtualization Based Security' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Enabled with UEFI lock' selected for 'Credential Guard Configuration'
CredentialGuard.remediation: Configure the policy value for Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > System > Device Guard > 'Turn On Virtualization Based Security' to 'Enabled' with 'Enabled with UEFI lock' selected for 'Credential Guard Configuration'.
